code: import axiosInstance from"./axios";export const authAPI={sendOtp:email=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/send-otp",{email},{withCredentials:true}),verifyOtp:data=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/verify-otp",data,{withCredentials:true}),completeRegistration:data=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/complete-registration",data,{withCredentials:true}),login:(email,password)=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/login",{email,password},{withCredentials:true}),register:(name,email,password)=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/register",{name,email,password},{withCredentials:true})};export const ticketsAPI={getUserTickets:()=>axiosInstance.get("/api/tickets/my"),createTicket:ticket=>axiosInstance.post("/api/tickets",ticket),getTicket:id=>axiosInstance.get("/api/tickets/".concat(id)),getTicketAdmin:id=>axiosInstance.get("/api/tickets/admin/".concat(id)),updateStatus:(id,status)=>axiosInstance.patch("/api/tickets/".concat(id),{status}),getAllTickets:()=>axiosInstance.get("/api/tickets"),addComment:(ticketId,content)=>axiosInstance.post("/api/tickets/".concat(ticketId,"/comments"),{content})};export const analyticsAPI={getStats:()=>axiosInstance.get("/api/analytics")};export const meAPI={getMe:()=>axiosInstance.get("/api/auth/me"),logout:()=>axiosInstance.post("/api/auth/logout")};
